channel.title: Privilege-Escalation on VAPT Walkthroughs
channel.description: Recent content in Privilege-Escalation on VAPT Walkthroughs

item.title: Scanned HTB - Insane Linux Box Walkthrough
item.description:
Scanned HTB - Insane Linux Box Walkthrough

Scanned is a Insane difficulty Linux machine from Hack The Box that demonstrates advanced sandbox escape techniques. This machine requires expertise in Linux internals, particularly chroot jail escapes, file descriptor manipulation, and privilege escalation via path hijacking. The exploitation chain involves escaping a malware sandbox application, exfiltrating data through ptrace syscall logging, and escalating privileges through library hijacking.

item.title: Perspective HTB - Insane Windows Box Walkthrough
item.description:
Perspective HTB - Insane Windows Box Walkthrough

Perspective is an Insane difficulty Windows machine from Hack The Box that showcases advanced ASP.NET exploitation techniques. This machine requires expertise in web application security, cryptographic attacks, and Windows privilege escalation, featuring a complex attack chain involving Server-Side Includes, ViewState deserialization, SSRF, and padding oracle attacks.
